item.title: About Eric Peña
item.description: Photo Credit: Samuel Sung About Me EMAIL: eric.pena@binghamton.edu Complex Systems Science graduate student and Clifford D. Clark Diversity Fellow at State University of New York at Binghamton. I studied machine learning and complex systems modeling. Current Projects Complexity in Conway’s Game of Life and other Life-Like Cellular Automata Gave a talk at NERCCS2021 in May. Paper currently under review in Artificial Life Journal Bayesian Sparse Network Reconstruction Presented poster at NERCCS2021 in May.
